#summary How to use javascript libraries with the qunit runner

= Introduction =

If you use any libraries, whether those are your own or external ones, you need to tell the phanromjs-qunit-runner which javascript file need to be available when running the tests.

The libraries tag is a normal [http://maven.apache.org/shared/file-management/examples/mojo.html maven file management] sections, support includes and excludes. You can currently add only one directory to this section, so all library files should be in the same place.
